alert.note: Alert for Dallam; Hartley (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 5:13PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Dallam and north central Hartley Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 513 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Ware, or 12 miles north of Dalhart, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dalhart and Ware. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
